Subject: Re: When Titans collide
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron exited and saw Autofire, "Welcome back. Here is your mission
Autofire. You are to position yourself, and part of the Decepticon army
near the Maximal base. Then when I signal you, you strike. Be careful
though, this is not a full scale assault, so dont rack up any casualties on
our side, but dont go easy on them. You are in charge." He finishes, then
enters the base. "And whatever you do, wait for my signal." He then heads
towards the control room.
